captions.text:
We were done long ago,
It’s love that can’t be complete

But I still have my expectations 
when I think about you

Listen I miss 
you so much

The shadows of farewell 
are still upon me

The songs you sang are 
still lingering in my ears

When I close my eyes and 
open it
I see you smiling at me

Your scent can’t be erased 
Say I still miss you
It’s too late to hold you

I still have my 
expectations like a fool

I still love you, I can’t 
erase you, I’m lost

I still can’t erase you, 
I’m waiting

I still can’t let you go, 
I can’t agree with it
I feel like you will be in my heart
Forever and make me suffer

I said I’ll forget you 
30 minutes ago

The pictures from
10 minutes again

I won’t be able to do anything 
with swing and miss

Even the mirror 
is laughing at me

If you are with me I can do 
everything around me easily

You are merciless, 
just like you
It’s too late to hold you

I still have my 
expectations like a fool

I still love you, I can’t 
erase you, I’m lost

I still can’t erase you, 
I’m waiting

I still can’t let you go, 
I can’t agree with it
I feel like you will be in my heart
Forever and make me suffer

I won’t show, although 
it might be nothing

I still love you, I can’t 
erase you, I’m lost

I still can’t erase you, 
I’m waiting

I still can’t let you go, 
I can’t agree with it
I feel like you will be in my heart
Forever and make me suffer

If I can take by time I wouldn't 
make the smallest mistakes

That chance is not mine 
and only pain remains

title: [MV] PURE(퓨어) _ I still love you(난 아직도 널)

comments.text:
Debuted on April 4. Members: Soohyeok, Chanhwee, Jimin, Jungbin and 
Younghu. In December 2013, Chanhwee, Jungbin, and Soohyeok left the group 
and the company, by the end of the same month a new member - Giho was 
announced. it's been told that the members will redebut under different 
ents/groups.

comments.text:
Well it already happened!^^ 
Pureboy debuted on November 2014 with 9 members: Sangmin, Jiho, Nankang, 
Youngbin, Jinsung, Sangyoon, Hayoung, Hyobin, and Jaewon! Their debut song 
is called Yellow Shirt~ which you can find on youtube and their Christmas 
song White Snow^^ They are currently in Japan and will comeback in April 
with their song '난' You should check out their rising star ep at Arirang 
Pops in Seoul
